revised_title: Susceptibility of Animals to the Trypanosome Causing Disease in Man in Nyasaland
tldr: The study investigates the effects of the trypanosome causing disease in man in Nyasaland on various animals, including goats, hartebeeste, and monkeys. The wild-game strain and wild Glossina morsitans strain are compared in terms of their impact on animals and their susceptibility to the disease.
